name: GDS_Ticket_The API for GDS Ticket.json
String:
{"metadata":{"namespace":"default","annotations":{"backstage.io/managed-by-location":"url:https://ubackstage.liontravel.com/catalogs/TripGDS_Ticket_api.yaml","backstage.io/managed-by-origin-location":"url:https://ubackstage.liontravel.com/catalogs/TripGDS_Ticket_api.yaml","backstage.io/view-url":"https://ubackstage.liontravel.com/catalogs/TripGDS_Ticket_api.yaml"},"name":"GDS_Ticket","description":"The API for GDS Ticket","uid":"20c7652b-e323-428d-ae24-778d318fc447","etag":"46824b8ec3ba9e48dfe2be287167056e47064ee5"},"apiVersion":"backstage.io/v1alpha1","kind":"API","spec":{"type":"openapi","lifecycle":"experimental","owner":"tripgds","definition":"openapi: 3.0.0 info: title: 全球目的地商品分銷系統 description:

摘要：

提供串接全球目的地商品分銷系統說明

串接流程：

  • 新串接
    • Step 1. 取得產品資料與報價
    • Step 2.下訂與取得入場憑證價

Postman 快速手上：

  • Collection - Go
  • Environment - Go

編修紀錄：

編修日期 項目 編修人 備註
2023/12/13 v1.5 初版釋出 Stella Huang -
2023/12/13 v1.5調整如下
1、產品 02 取得產品詳細內容新增timezone參考資訊
2、產品 03 取得產品規格內容優化options，新增option_rulesets下訂規則
3、產品 03 取得產品規格內容優化q4booking、q4tourist問答結構，支援巢狀問答。
4、訂單 01 下訂與取得報價調整a4booking、a4tourist傳入值方式
5、訂單 04 取得訂單內容增加voucher_type（憑證類型）資訊 		Stella Huang -
version: '1.5' servers: - url: https://gds-sandbox.welcometw.com/v1.5 description: sanbox 測試開發環境 paths: /product/list/{page}: get: tags: - 產品 summary: 01 列出可銷售產品 description: 列出可銷售產品 parameters: - name: page in: path description: 頁數 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: integer - name: list_all in: query description: 0 僅列出上架商品, 1 也列出下架商品, 預設 0 required: false style: form explode: true schema: type: integer responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductListResponse' examples: first: $ref: '#/components/examples/ProductList' /product/{uuid}/{lang}: get: tags: - 產品 summary: 02 取得產品詳細內容 description: 取得產品詳細內容 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 產品編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string - name: lang in: path description: 語言, 支援 ZH-HANT, ZH-HANS, JA, EN required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductDetailResponse' example: result: uuid: 00000001-0000-0000-0000-0000f1f113f2 name: KidZania Singapore E-ticket content:

description

KidZania is an interactive indoor park masked as a kid-sized city that caters especially to kids from four to 12. In KidZania Singapore, kids have access to all its facilities that cover approximately 81,000 square metres. With such a big space, kids can expect a complete and functioning city with paved streets, buildings, moving vehicles, and the like.

notice_info:

warnings

Safety and insurance:
- Children below eight years old must be accompanied by an adult.
- The same adult must be present during the check-in and checkout of the child.
- Children ages eight to 17 can come inside "The City" without adult supervision.

more_info:

additionalInfo

Notes:
- Adults entering KidZania Singapore must always have a child in tow.
- This is strictly for a one-time entry only. Re-entry is not permitted.
- Temporary exits are not allowed for kids at all times.

What to wear:
- Modest, comfortable set of clothes
- Good pair of shoes

What to bring:
- Extra clothes
- Face towel
- Bottled water

priceIncludes

Admission fee

order_info: "" business_hour: 10:00:00-18:00:00 highlight: |- Visit KidZania Singapore, which offers various role-playing activities for kids Let children develop life skills through an interactive learning experience Explore the fully functioning kid-sized city that measures 81,000 square feet categories: - uuid: 2eb8d520-3367-11e9-ab43-638d2e4e5701 category: 景區、樂園 sub_category: 景點門票 product_types: - uuid: 7c783d67-d2b9-4a2e-8dad-3600d6454e70 name: KidZania Singapore E-ticket status: 1 need_confirm: 1 order_leadtime: 1 order_deadline: "08:00:00" booking_required: 1 is_send: 0 cust_info: 0 voucher_type: PDF country: SG city: Southwest longitude: 103.8198864 latitude: 1.2509114 timezone: "Asia/Singapore" image: https://s3.amazonaws.com/playground.bemyguest.com.sg/images/content/original/5766ed59-5fa7-451f-a144-bb0f70ad4787.jpg images: - https://s3.amazonaws.com/playground.bemyguest.com.sg/images/content/original/5766ed59-5fa7-451f-a144-bb0f70ad4787.jpg - https://s3.amazonaws.com/playground.bemyguest.com.sg/images/content/original/f66d2beb-24a9-4afa-9ae6-87b0e7799e38.jpg - https://s3.amazonaws.com/playground.bemyguest.com.sg/images/content/original/a548aff2-ac42-4f2a-86ed-c72b543c3a0d.jpg api_required: "1.5" updated_time: "2020-01-01T02:08:00.000000Z" api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" /product/type/{uuid}/{lang}: get: tags: - 產品 summary: 03 取得產品規格內容 description: 取得產品規格內容
🔴 因產品結構的關係，️系統中將存在少數產品會有非常多規格的狀況，可參照此 文件，來了解如何在介面上進行資料的收斂，藉此達到前台頁面能有更好的購物體驗。 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 產品規格編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string - name: lang in: path description: 語言, 支援 ZH-HANT, ZH-HANS, JA, EN required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductTypeResponse' example: result: uuid: ffe484e3-c33e-41eb-9bec-50fd1f0a349b name: Luge and Skyride Experience sessions: 1 min_sr_price: 1200 currency: SGD min_qty: 1 max_qty: 20 note: gds:age_limit: 'Adults age : 13-99, Children age : 3-12' gds:description:

Product Specification

You get to experience one Luge and one Skyride

How to use the voucher

- Sentosa Station (VivoCity, Lobby L, Level 3)
- Imbiah Lookout Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Beach Station Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Waterfront Station Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Merlion Plaza Ticketing Counter
- Faber Peak Ticketing Kiosk

Voucher Redemption Address

- Sentosa Station (VivoCity, Lobby L, Level 3)
- Imbiah Lookout Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Beach Station Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Waterfront Station Ticketing Counter or Kiosk
- Merlion Plaza Ticketing Counter
- Faber Peak Ticketing Kiosk

cancel_day: 3 cancel_hour: 23 refund_percent: 0 refund_price: null refund_fee: null - cancel_day: 7 cancel_hour: 23 refund_percent: 100 refund_price: null refund_fee: null api_required: "1.5" updated_time: "2020-01-01T02:08:00.000000Z" api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" /product/price/{uuid}/{lang}: get: tags: - 產品 summary: 04 取得報價/場次報價 description: 取得產品報價或場次報價。
一、此階段拿到的價錢僅為現階段報價，訂單於交易中可能受匯率波動影響導致價錢變更，因此每筆訂單實際金額需要以 /booking/confirm/{uuid} 02 回傳值為主。
🔴 系統一定會提供建議售價與成本價，但牌價部分則不一定有，若牌價顯示 null 則表示無提供。
🔴 parity_price 為最低零售價，若此欄位不等於 null 時，表示分銷商販售給客人的價錢不可低於該金額；反之若為 null 則表示不受限制。
🔴 有場次產品僅提供成本價與建議售價。
二、提供各票種的庫存數量。庫存數量可用於前端客人選擇數量的限制判斷
🔴 因供應商庫存數量變動頻繁，此數量非即時庫存，僅作為參考使用，實際請以下訂結果為主。 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 產品規格編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string - name: lang in: path description: 語言, 支援 ZH-HANT, ZH-HANS, JA, EN required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string - name: date_start in: query description: 查詢起始日期 required: false schema: type: string format: "date" - name: date_end in: query description: 查詢結束日期 required: false style: form explode: false schema: type: string format: "date" responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: oneOf: - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductPriceResponse' - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductPriceSessionResponse' examples: price: summary: 無場次產品價格 value: result: - date: "2020-06-18" options: - uuid: "5a0829c4-ca13-43ba-b88c-75e9ae8b0719" cost: 3395 sr_price: 4439 card_price: null parity_price: null currency: SGD quantity: 19 - date: "2020-06-19" options: - uuid: "5a0829c4-ca13-43ba-b88c-75e9ae8b0719" cost: 3395 sr_price: 4439 card_price: null parity_price: null currency: SGD quantity: 10 api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" session: summary: 有場次價格 value: result: - date: "2020-12-03" sessions: - uuid: "c19bfbac-747e-48cd-a446-7d8158652eb5" startTime: "08:00:00" endTime: "12:00:00" quantity: 10 options: - uuid: "0e3f1052-fbe6-4130-9b84-c699122dcdef" cost: 2300 sr_price: 2499 card_price: null currency: "TWD" min_qty: 0 max_qty: 10 quantity: 10 - uuid: "3cbc1dfb-3465-4ea4-9ceb-61c6c13f61a4" startTime: "12:00:00" endTime: "16:00:00" quantity: 15 options: - uuid: "0e3f1052-fbe6-4130-9b84-c699122dcdef" cost: 2300 sr_price: 2499 card_price: null currency: "TWD" min_qty: 0 max_qty: 10 quantity: 10 - uuid: "6a942ad4-fa1f-4a31-96ba-0d1b0bcde964" cost: 2350 sr_price: 2549 card_price: null currency: "TWD" min_qty: 0 max_qty: 10 quantity: 5 api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" /booking: post: tags: - 訂單 summary: 01 下訂與取得報價 description: 建立 GDS 訂單並得知最新報價，這個階段不會完成交易，需要再確認(confirm)訂單。
🔴商品由於匯率或是供應商異動價格影響，因此「price api」 的報價」與「訂單結算價格」是有可能會有落差的。
整個流程上，每筆訂單的原始幣別金額，請以 booking 當下回傳的為主，後續對帳也是依據這個金額換算。
🔴若有開通代收轉付服務時，才需多傳client_sale_price以及buyer中的資料。僅client_sale_price、buyer_email為必填。
requestBody: description: 訂單填寫方式 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrderRequest' examples: first: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev1' second: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev2' third: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev3' fourth: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev4' fifth: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev5' sixth: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev6' seventh: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev7' eight: $ref: '#/components/examples/OrderRequest_ev8' required: true responses: "200": description: 訂購結果 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/BookingResponse' example: result: uuid: 459b8797-0049-4b81-a73d-a5287b7b0ba5 total: 7.7 currency: SGD api_status: 0 api_version: 1.5 /booking/confirm/{uuid}: post: tags: - 訂單 summary: 02 確認訂單 description: 確認訂單, 讓已預訂的訂單生效
🔴 現階段雙方為結算台幣金額(TWD)。＊台幣計算金額方式：原幣別金額x匯率=結算金額 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 訂單編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 訂購結果 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/BookingDetailResponse' examples: first: $ref: '#/components/examples/BookingDetailResponse' /booking/list/{page}: get: tags: - 訂單 summary: 03 取得訂單列表 description: 取得訂單列表，訂單會以建單日期降冪排序 parameters: - name: page in: path description: 產品規格 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: integer responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrderListResponse' example: result: total_records: 4 total_pages: 1 records: - 訂單 summary: 04 取得訂單內容 description: 取得訂單內容。後續對帳，將以此訂單細節為主， parameters: - name: id in: path description: GDS 訂單編號 (uuid) / 分銷商訂單編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrderDetailResponse' example: result: uuid: 625742f0-0445-11ea-9155-25b06992eebb client_order_id: BY-POSTMAN-13010 status: 1 product_uuid: 00000001-0000-0000-0000-0000f1f113f2 product_name: KidZania Singapore E-ticket product_type_uuid: 7c783d67-d2b9-4a2e-8dad-3600d6454e70 product_type_name: KidZania Singapore E-ticket product_session: 284a9165-7dcc-5165-8437-3a7546d77fbc product_options: 98991b94-5de4-472a-89b5-a5bcd423112d: qty: 1 amount: 7.7 rate: 21.83 price: 168 currency: TWD first_name: Jeremy last_name: Lin contact_number: "+886 01234567891" email: gdsfontrip@gmail.com booking_date: "2019-11-14" voucher_status: 1 voucher_type: PDF voucher_validity: null voucher: "https://gds-sandbox-backend.welcometw.com/voucher/2020-05/sample.zip" created_time: "2020-01-01T02:08:00.000000Z" updated_time: "2020-01-01T02:08:00.000000Z" api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" /booking/cancel/{uuid}: post: tags: - 訂單 summary: 05 取消訂單 description: 取消訂單 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 訂單編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/CancellationResponse' example: result: order_id: cf599410-bfc7-11e9-9a90-0f282239523f status: 0 reason: "" response: "" refund_amount: 0 refund_fee: 0 api_status: 0 api_version: "1.5" /booking/voucher/{uuid}: get: tags: - 訂單 summary: 06 憑證相關資訊 description: 取得「電子憑證」及「憑證使用狀態」資訊

⚠️「憑證使用狀態 」注意事項
1.於 4/22 起的訂單，才提供憑證的使用狀態，同步範圍可設定 4/22 起的訂單
2. 由於此資訊異動頻繁，請串接 webhooks:[憑證使用狀態更新] 事件 來進行更新，藉減緩雙方系統的負載；固定排程目前則建議可每週執行一次即可。
3. 詳情串接內容，可參照 憑證使用狀態進階說明。 parameters: - name: uuid in: path description: 訂單編號 required: true style: simple explode: false schema: type: string responses: "200": description: 成功回應 content: application/json: schema: $ref: '#/components/schemas/VoucherResponse' examples: first: $ref: '#/components/examples/VoucherResponse_1' second: $ref: '#/components/examples/VoucherResponse_2' type: array items: $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductDetailResponse_result_product_types' status: type: integer description: 上下架狀態, 0:下架, 1:上架 need_confirm: type: integer description: 是否需等待供應商確認, 0:下單即確認, 1:需等待供應商確認 order_leadtime: type: integer description: 需提前幾天預訂
(為此產品，所有規格中最少需提前預定的天數。各規格實際限制，請參照[產品規格 > order_leadtime]為主) order_deadline: type: string description: UTC+0 時間,需在預訂截止日的何時前預訂
(為此產品，所有規格中最少需提前預定的天數對應的預定時間。各規格實際限制，請參照[產品規格 > order_leadtime]為主)。 booking_required: type: integer description: 產品是否需預約, 0:免預約, 1:需預約;
需預約產品：於下訂時 date 欄位，需要帶入實際使用的預約日期（分銷商於下訂前需要先行確認該產品於當天是否有價錢與庫存）。
免預約產品：於下訂時 date 欄位，請填寫下訂規格的最近可購買日期（分銷介面上，可不提供日曆讓客人做選擇，由分銷商自行帶入可購買日期即可。） is_send: type: integer description: 是否為寄送產品, 0:不需寄送, 1:需寄送 cust_info: type: string description: 需要提供幾位旅客資訊, 0:免提供, 1:僅需聯絡人, n:每一位旅客 voucher_type: type: string description: 憑證形式 country: type: string description: 國家 city: type: string description: 城市 longitude: type: number description: 經度 latitude: type: number status: type: integer description: 上下架狀態, 0:下架, 1:上架 multiple: type: integer description: 規定的訂購倍數, 例如:
multiple=2, 下訂數量須為 2, 4, 6, 8, ... weight: type: integer description: 每一份訂購的內含數量, 例如:
weight=4, qty=1, 訂購 1 份取得 4 個座位
weight=3, qty=3, 訂購 3 份取得 9 個座位 order_deadline: type: string description: UTC+0 時間,需在預訂截止日的何時前預訂。
考量資料在同步上的時間的落差，建議可於前端加上此欄位與 order_leadtime 的限制，能降低消費者購買到已截止預定的產品。 order_leadtime: type: integer description: 需提前幾天預訂。
考量資料在同步上的時間的落差，建議可於前端加上此欄位與 order_deadline 的限制，能降低消費者購買到已截止預定的產品。 validity: type: integer description: 憑證使用限制:
0:當天有效
1:遊玩日期後幾天有效
2:出票日期幾天後有效
3:指定日期內有效
4:日期區間內有效
5:見憑證效期說明 validity_day: type: string description: 憑證可延後天數, 僅 validity=1,2 有效。
例如:validity = 2, validity_day = 90，表示在未來的 90天內（含)能使用，最終憑證使用到期日，會於憑證中顯示。 validiay_date: type: string description: 憑證有效日期, 僅 validity=3 有效。
例如:validity_date = 2020-06-03，表示憑證，最後使用日期為2020-06-03。 validiay_start_date: type: string description: 憑證有效起始日期, 僅 validity=4 有效。
例如:validiay_start_date = 2020-07-30，表示憑證，可使用起始日期為2020-07-30。 validiay_end_date: type: string description: 憑證有效結束日期, 僅 validity=4 有效。
例如:validiay_end_date = 2021-07-30，表示憑證，可使用結束日期為2021-07-30。 validiay_instruction: type: string description: '見憑證效期說明, 僅 validity=5 有效。
依商品不同，描述可能有不同格式。
例如: validiay_instruction = 商品A: 2021-07-30, 商品B: 無限制效期, 商品C: 2021-07-31 至 2021-12-31 有效。
